TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ConflictOption extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies how conflicting changes to the data source will be detected and resolved.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.ConflictOption CompareAllSearchableValues = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Update and delete statements will include all searchable columns from the table in the WHERE clause. This is equivalent to specifying `CompareAllValuesUpdate` | `CompareAllValuesDelete`.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.ConflictOption CompareRowVersion = int32(2)

Docs.summary: If any Timestamp columns exist in the table, they are used in the WHERE clause for all generated update statements. This is equivalent to specifying `CompareRowVersionUpdate` | `CompareRowVersionDelete`.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.ConflictOption OverwriteChanges = int32(3)

Docs.summary: All update and delete statements include only <xref:System.Data.DataTable.PrimaryKey%2A> columns in the WHERE clause. If no <xref:System.Data.DataTable.PrimaryKey%2A> is defined, all searchable columns are included in the WHERE clause. This is equivalent to `OverwriteChangesUpdate` | `OverwriteChangesDelete`.
